data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_a60a866ab6752a7f66766e720da987ea.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Moskov's Basic Attacks can penetrate the target and deal <font color="fba51f"> (+68% Total Physical Attack)</font>-<font color="fba51f"> (+110% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies behind them (scales with hero level). Each Basic Attack hit reduces the cooldowns of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Walker</font> by 0.8s and <font color="a6aafb">Spear of Misery</font> by 0.8s.

Moskov teleports to the target location, increasing his Attack Speed to 1.15 times for 3s. Meanwhile, his Basic Attack deals <font color="fba51f"> (+10% Total Physical Attack)</font> more damage to enemies behind the primary target.

Moskov launches a powerful strike at the target enemy hero or Creep, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, knocking them back, and revealing their position for 2s.

If the target collides with an enemy hero when knocked back, they'll both take 200<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and be stunned for 1.2s. If the enemy is knocked into a wall, they will also be stunned for the same duration.

After a short delay, Moskov throws the <font color="a6aafb">Spear of Destruction</font> in the target direction, dealing 340<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path and to the first enemy hero hit. Upon hitting an enemy hero, the spear pierces them, dealing 10% extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies behind them. The target and enemies hit by the piercing damage will be slowed by 50% for 1s (the slow duration scales with the spear's travel time, up to 3s).

When <font color="a6aafb">Spear of Destruction</font> hits the first enemy hero, it creates a shadow behind them and refreshes the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Walker</font>.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Moskov casts <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Walker</font> from the shadow's location (shares the same cooldown as the skill).

data.name: Moskov

__data.skilldesc:
For up to 8 Basic Attacks within the next 5s, increase Attack Speed to 1.5 times and the Attack Speed cap to 500%.
The Basic Attacks also <font color="62f8fe">ignore</font> 8 (+1*Hero Level) of the target's <font color="ffe63c">Physical Defense</font> and restore 60<font color="fba51f">(+0.15 Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+0.15 Total Magic Power)</font> HP on hit.
__data.skilldesc_text: For up to <Num2> Basic Attacks within the next <Num1>s, increase Attack Speed to <Num3> times and the Attack Speed cap to <%Num4>.####The Basic Attacks also [C2ignore] <Num5> of the target's [C5Physical Defense] and restore <Num6> HP on hit.
__data.skilldescemblem:
For up to 8 Basic Attacks within the next 5s, increase Attack Speed to 1.5 times and the Attack Speed cap to 500%.
The Basic Attacks also <font color="62f8fe">ignore</font> 8 (+1*Hero Level) of the target's <font color="ffe63c">Physical Defense</font> and restore 60<font color="fba51f">(+15% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+15% Total Magic Power)</font> HP on hit.

equiplist.equipskilldesc: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
equiplist.equipskill3: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.

+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
equiplist.equipskill2: Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.
Endless Strike: After every 2 non-Crit Basic Attacks, the Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 80% (and Attack Speed cap is increased to 500%) and triggers Attack Effects an additional 2 time(s).
equiplist.equiptips:
+55 Extra Physical Attack
+15% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
equiplist.equipskill2: Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).

recommendmasterplan.name: BF - blackMarch
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: A warrior of the desert that embraced the darkness to seek his revenge.

assist.desc: Moskov works well with heroes like Atlas and Gatotkaca who can CC groups of enemies so he can focus on maximizing the damage of his piercing AOE.

strong.desc: Moskov's 1st Skill provides a blink effect, making him a threat to fighters with poor mobility like Thamuz and Balmond.

weak.desc: Moskov is countered by heroes with high mobility, such as Lancelot and Natalia, who can quickly close the gap and take him out.
